tool_description: Quickly integrate SMS messaging services into various solutions by using Infobip HTTP application programming interface (HTTP API). The HTTP API can be used for sending SMS messages, collecting delivery reports, making Number Context (number validation) requests and receiving inbound SMS messages sent from mobile phones.
name: Infobip SMS
title: Infobip SMS

api_list.name: Delivery reports
api_list.description: This method allows you to get one time delivery reports for sent SMS. http://dev.infobip.com/docs/delivery-reports
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://infobip.p.rapidapi.com/sms/1/reports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "infobip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sent messages logs
